Description:
"Ideal Investment Opportunity"
Take advantage of this opportunity to secure a fantastic large corner block in a residential growth zone. A location central to all amenities in Corio and Norlane, this home will be the first on your list! It is within close proximity to local schools, bus routes, medical facilities, sporting grounds, and a short stroll to Corio Central Shopping Centre. Easy access to the Ring Road brings Melbourne under an hour away & Geelong CBD only 15 minutes.
-Master bedroom with ensuite
-1 bedroom with BIR, CF & split system
-Kitchen has SSS, gas CT & wall oven
-Updated main bathroom
-Large backyard
-Side access for caravan and boat storage
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
RECENTLY UPGRADED AND PERFECTLY PRESENTED
Tastefully updated and a divine presentation awaits the lucky purchaser wanting a home with space and all the modern luxuries. Master suite offering a walk in robe and a well-appointed ensuite, carpeted lounge and dining adjoin the renovated kitchen and informal meals area. Updated central bathroom and two further bedrooms, one with BIR's. Impressive features including central heating, split system, 16 solar panels on the roof, single drive through remote garage and a further two bay shed for extra vehicles or work shop and four camera security system. Situated on a 606m2 allotment you are well positioned and serviced by public transport, shopping and convenient access to Melbourne.

Description:
Attention FHBs, Investors or Renovators!
Corio has been enjoying fantastic capital growth over the past 12 months in particular and it is expected this will continue for some time yet. This property represents a fantastic opportunity for the shrewd investor, those looking for a project or a FHB looking for an entry level home. Sitting on 587m2 this 2 Bedroom home is due for a makeover but is ideally located close to bus stops and Corio Village. Comprising 2 bedrooms, bathroom, and functional kitchen, lounge and dining with a good sized rear yard. It also features a large shed at the rear western boundary of the property. With loads of potential this one is definitely worth a look!

"Perfect First Home or Investment!"
First home buyers and investors don't miss this fantastic opportunity to purchase an updated 3 bedroom home situated on a 575sqm (approx) block. Conveniently located within walking distance to Corio Central Shopping Centre, schools and public transport. Also easy access to the highway, bringing Melbourne under an hour away & Geelong CBD only 15 minutes. Inspection is a must as this property won't last long!
- 3 generous sized bedrooms with BIR's
- Open plan kitchen/dining & living
- Kitchen has gas cook top with ample bench space
- Central bathroom
-9ft ceilings & floating floorboards throughout
- Reverse cycle a/c plus ceiling fans in bedrooms
- Freshly painted
- Enormous pergola with low maintenance eco decking
- Single garage

Get into the market at the right price
This neat 2 bedroom unit offers purchasers an opportunity to get into this sought after residential real estate pocket. The light filled spacious living area has floating timber flooring and split system air conditioner, it flows through to the open plan kitchen which has ample storage and bench space.
With a carport and storage shed, private courtyard this home is handy to shops, schools, parks and with easy access to the highway, this property presents great value with a solid return.

Description:
Immaculate family home in Rose Park Estate.
Located in the sought after pocket of Rose Park, this 3 bedroom property offers a lot for a first home buyer, families and investors alike. At entry of the home you will find the first living area which is enclosed before finding the open living, kitchen and dining space for entertainers delight with access to the concrete outdoor space. The kitchen offers ample cupboard space and gas cooking with plenty of bench space. 3 spacious bedrooms, 1 with ensuite and WIR and 2 with BIR. To the back of the home the bathroom and laundry offer ample space conveniently located away from the rest of the home. Currently tenanted for $335 pw with easy access to the Geelong Ring Road & Corio Shopping Centre just a short commute away all major amenities are close at hand. Do not miss your chance to secure this prime piece of real estate today!

Description:
Prime location opportunity
They say location is everything, then 213 Princes Highway Corio is in the absolute prime location for your future development project. The property is zoned RGZ2 so you have the ability to subdivide (STCA).
The existing dwelling is a 3 bedroom 1 bathroom home that is in excellent condition and is currently tenanted until May 2018. Featuring polished floor boards throughout the home, a neat and functional kitchen and has gas heating and split system air conditioning, the astute investor will see the amazing potential this home has.
Just when you think it can’t get any better, it does when you factor that it’s only a short stroll to Corio Central Shopping Centre, access to public transport, moments to numerous schools and a 10 minute drive to the Geelong CBD.
Opportunities like this don’t come around very often, so please feel free to call me anytime to make an inspection at the property.

Everything you've been looking for.
This attractive three bedroom home is proudly positioned on a large allotment of 597m2 (approx.) in the heart of an explosively developing suburb. Comprising of 3 bedrooms (2 with BIRS), extensive lounge upon entrance boasting polish floorboards that flow throughout the home, central bathroom with separate toilet, updated kitchen with gas cooking as well as a second rumpus room towards the rear of the home. This property is simply ideal for those wanting to downsize in comfort or looking to invest wisely. Positioned a short drive to schools, shops and the Geelong Ring Road, this property is easily accessible to public transport in a well established neighbourhood. Upon entering the home you are presented with a large lounge providing gas heating for the cooler months, three decent sized bedrooms, central bathroom and a separate toilet to the rear of the house. The kitchen comes complete with gas cooking as well as ample space for a meals area. Currently tenanted at $265p/w this is the ideal investment opportunity to add to the portfolio with a well maintained home and great tenants.
Insights: 11B Granault Parade, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Low maintenance abode.
Investors and first home buyers alike will appreciate the location and size of this bright and appealing home situated on a 205m2 approx. allotment. This humble abode provides 2 generous sized bedrooms, both with BIR's. The spacious living area located at the rear of the home boasts plenty of natural light, comfort and provides gas heating, with easy access through to the beautifully neat kitchen complete with gas cooking and dishwasher. A large island bench forms the centre attraction of the kitchen, overlooking the living area while also featuring stainless steel appliances. Outside provides a paved and low maintenance garden area, all fully fenced with access to the single car garage. In close proximity to reserves, quality schools for all ages, easy access to the Princes Highway & just a short commute to the North Shore train station and currently tenanted at $275pw makes this property an ideal investment opportunity.
Insights: 3/31 Cranbourne Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
"Everything You've Ever Wanted & More"
If location, size & quality are important to you then look no further than this family home. Consisting of 3 BR, ens & WIR to the main br & BIRs to remaining BRs, a large OP lounge/living area with gas wall heating, updated kitchen with ceramic cook tops, s/steel apps & plenty of storage space + a spacious laundry. Outdoor covered pergola + large Colorbond garage with 3 roller doors. 2 car carport with extra room for all-year-round ent. & DB gates that give you rear access to the property for cars/boats/caravans. Located in a quiet court on a large 546m2 block (approx.) with a potential rent return of $320/week.
